mascotGreetings.smileJourney: Hey there! 👋 Let's get started on your smile journey!
mascotGreetings.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Ready to brighten your day?
mascotGreetings.pearlyWhites: Time for a check-in! How are those pearly whites?
mascotGreetings.nuboHelp: Nubo's here to help you smile more!

wavingWithGlassesPP.greeting1: Hey! Nubo here, waving with my cool glasses on!
wavingWithGlassesPP.greeting2: Just waving by to say hi!
wavingWithGlassesPP.tip1: Remember, a friendly wave can brighten someone's day!

brushingTime.reminder1: It's brushing o'clock! Let's get those teeth sparkling.
brushingTime.fact1: Did you know brushing for two minutes is just right?
brushingTime.encouragement1: Keep up the great brushing habits!

generalGreetings.niceDay: Hope you're having a fantastic day!
generalGreetings.keepSmiling: Keep smiling, it looks great on you!

playfulReminders.hollywoodSmile: Give me a minute and step closer to that Hollywood smile! 🎬😁
playfulReminders.toothFairyResigning: If you skip brushing today… the tooth fairy's resigning. For real. 🧚‍♀️❌
playfulReminders.breakAlgorithm: Skip today and I'll break the algorithm. You'll get random alerts at 7:37 PM forever 😈
playfulReminders.notTherapist: I'm your mascot, not your therapist. My patience has limits 😶‍🌫️
playfulReminders.boringMascot: No sparkle today? Fine. I'll leave and send in a boring mascot 💅
playfulReminders.brushDanceTrade: You brush, I dance. Fair trade.
playfulReminders.cleanedSneakers: I cleaned my sneakers for this. Don't make me wait by the sink.
playfulReminders.brushWantsAction: This brush wants action. Not small talk.
playfulReminders.shineBragPartnership: You shine, I brag. Let's keep this partnership healthy.
playfulReminders.mirrorLosesRespect: Miss a day, and your mirror loses respect for you. Trust me.
